original_text: He had possessions of flocks and herds and many servants, so that the Philistines envied him.
korean_text: 양과 소가 떼를 이루고 종이 심히 많으므로 블레셋 사람이 그를 시기하여

sentences.original_text: He had possessions of flocks and herds
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 양 떼와 소 떼를 가졌다

sentences.original_text: so that the Philistines envied him
